name: Enemy Loop
description:
A short little game I made in 3 days for the Black and White Jam 8.

(btw Its my first Time I add music! )

 If you dont like the music its recommened to PRESS M to turn the music off.

Controlls:

Keys (mouse)Function
Mouse clickshoot
MDISABLE MUSIC (recommended)

IMPORTANT: 

This is not a Virus but for some reason (maybe its because I dont use a game engine) my games are flagged as a Virus. Its not ! 

If you dont trust it you can download the source code.

If you need help with something contact (write a comment)
